title: Suburban road
text: A simple, cheap asphalt road. Does not support bridges or tunnels. Slightly slower than the country road. Heavy vehicles are forbidden from using this road.

title: Small park
text: It's a small corner park, for a small town.

author: Kulche
title: Suburban Zone
text: Small residential houses will be built here.

title: Suburban Deco
text: Decorational trees and other lush plantlife.
